selectedList - Variable in class todoapp.controller.ListScreenController
 
selectedList - Variable in class todoapp.model.AppState
 
selectedTask - Variable in class todoapp.controller.TaskListController
 
serialize() - Method in class todoapp.ProcessState
serialize() reads the ToDoList data from AppState and writes the serializable data to the filesystem
setCategory(String) - Method in class todoapp.model.ToDoList
setCategory method provides a way for a ToDoLists category to be changed after it has already been created.
setComplete(boolean) - Method in class todoapp.model.Task
setComplete sets the Tasks complete field to a new boolean value.
setCompletionDate(String) - Method in class todoapp.model.Task
setCompletionDate sets the date when the task should be completed by as a String because it is edited in a TreeTableView.
setDeadlineDate(LocalDate) - Method in class todoapp.model.ToDoList
setDeadLineDate method provides a way for the LocalDate part of a ToDoLists deadline to be changed after creation time.
setDeadlineTime(LocalTime) - Method in class todoapp.model.ToDoList
setDeadLineTime method provides a way for the LocalTime part of a ToDoLists deadline to be changed after creation time.
setDescription(String) - Method in class todoapp.model.Task
setDescription sets this Tasks description to the new value.
setEditPressed(boolean) - Method in class todoapp.model.AppState
setEditPressed() sets the boolean editPressed to whatever boolean value is passed to it.
setListName(String) - Method in class todoapp.model.ToDoList
setListName provides a way for a ToDoLists name to be changed after it has already been created.
setLists(List<ToDoList>) - Method in class todoapp.model.AppState
The setLists method is solely for setting up the singleton appState when data has been deserialized from the filesystem.
setSelectedList(ToDoList) - Method in class todoapp.model.AppState
setSelectedList sets the current ToDoList.
